description: BEIJING- China reaffirmed its role as a key diplomatic mediator through Wednesday’s informal trilateral meeting in Beijing, offering Afghanistan and Pakistan a crucial platform to address bilateral issues through peaceful dialogue.
title: Beijing breakthrough: Afghanistan and Pakistan to upgrade diplomatic relations

description: Israeli forces opened fire near a convoy of foreign diplomats at the entrance of Jenin refugee camp in the occupied West Bank on Tuesday, drawing widespread condemnation and calls for accountability.
title: Israel fires at diplomats in Jenin, EU condemns the move

description: In the heart of South Asia, two nuclear-armed giants, India and Pakistan, find themselves embroiled in a direct confrontation that poses a significant threat to regional stability and global peace. The recent horrific attack on tourists in Pahalgam sent shockwaves through the community and beyond, leaving behind a legacy of loss and fear that no amount of military might can ever erase.
title: The India-Pakistan face-off: A crucial moment for global peace

description: Spain’s parliament on Tuesday passed a non-binding motion calling on the government to impose an arms embargo on Israel in response to its military operations in Gaza, Anadolu Agency reported.
title: Spanish parliament passes non-binding motion urging arms embargo on Israel

description: In the past 24 hours alone (the Wednesday afternoon time), Israeli air and ground assaults killed at least 82 Palestinians and wounded another 262, according to Gaza’s health ministry, Middle East Eye reported.
title: Israeli attacks kill 82 in 24 hours in Gaza

description: Pakistan and India have agreed to withdraw troop reinforcements deployed during their recent conflict back to their peacetime positions by the end of May, according to a senior Pakistani security official, South China Morning Post reported.
title: Pakistan, India agree to withdraw troops by end of May

description: United States President Donald Trump and Secretary of Defense Pete Hegseth have laid out their clearest plan yet for the “Golden Dome” missile defense program, which would include putting weapons in space for the first time, Al Jazeera reported.
title: US will put weapons in space as part of ‘Golden Dome’ plan

description: Pope Leo XIV on Wednesday appealed for Israel to allow humanitarian aid to enter Gaza, calling the situation in the Palestinian enclave "yet more worrying and saddening," Reuters reported.
title: New pope urges Israel to allow humanitarian aid to Gaza

description: TEHRAN – The Mehdi Gholami Orchestra, featuring the renowned Iranian musician Keivan Saket, will perform a varied repertoire across three sections of classic, mugham and regional music at Tehran’s Vahdat Hall on May 28.
title: Renowned orchestra combines classical, folk, mugham music at Tehran’s Vahdat Hall

description: TEHRAN – Jean-Luc Godard’s 2004 film “Our Music” will be screened at the Iranian Artists Forum (IAF) in Tehran on Friday.
title: IAF to show Jean-Luc Godard’s “Our Music”

description: TEHRAN – The Iranian short film “Khalil” directed by Seyed Payam Hosseini has been selected for the 23rd Plein la Bobine International Film Festival in La Bourboule, France, from June 8 to 13.
title: Iranian short film “Khalil” to participate in 23rd Plein la Bobine

description: TEHRAN – An exhibition of poster and typography on the occasion of the first anniversary of the martyrdom of President Ebrahim Raisi and his companions was inaugurated at the Aali Gallery of Tehran's Art Bureau on Tuesday.
title: “Servants of the Nation" exhibition inaugurated in Tehran

description: TEHRAN - In an interview with Abdolreza Faraji Rad, a professor of geopolitics, Ettelaat examined the recent tense positions of Iran and the United States after some rounds of indirect negotiations.
title: Iran-US talks face challenges

description: TEHRAN – Iran has executed the individual responsible for the January 2023 attack on Azerbaijan's embassy in Tehran, which resulted in the death of one person.
title: Iran executes gunman in 2023 Azerbaijan embassy attack

description: Iran’s Ambassador and Permanent Representative to the United Nations, Amir-Saeid Iravani, firmly denied allegations that Tehran violated the UN arms embargo on Yemen, calling the accusations "entirely baseless" and politically motivated.
title: Iran rejects ‘baseless’ claims of violating Yemen arms embargo, calls for cooperation at UN

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s Ambassador to the United Kingdom, Ali Mousavi, has sounded the alarm over potential "false flag operations" aimed at sabotaging Tehran-London relations.
title: Operation Susannah 2.0? Tehran warns UK of Mossad-style plots to derail ties

description: MADRID – Leader of the Islamic Revolution Ayatollah Seyyed Ali Khamenei, on Tuesday dismissed “absurd demands” from the United States in the ongoing nuclear negotiations.
title: Tehran’s national policy unaffected by pressure and threats

description: TEHRAN – Iran has named former Interior Minister Abdolreza Rahmani Fazli as its new ambassador to the People’s Republic of China.
title: Former interior minister appointed Iran’s new ambassador to China

description: TEHRAN – The Iranian Parliament has approved a landmark treaty on a comprehensive strategic partnership with the Russian Federation, marking a pivotal step in deepening ties between the two countries across a wide range of sectors.
title: Iranian Parliament ratifies strategic partnership treaty with Russia

description: TEHRAN – Hamas accuses Netanyahu of sabotaging ceasefire negotiations amid more Israeli casualties in Gaza.
title: Netanyahu “misleading global opinion”

description: BEIRUT — Ahead of the upcoming visit of Morgan Ortagus, President Donald Trump’s deputy special envoy for West Asia, Palestinian Authority President Mahmoud Abbas is visiting Beirut.
title: Abbas visits Beirut ahead of Ortagus as issue of displaced Palestinians takes center stage

description: TEHRAN - The European Union faces increasing criticism for its handling of the Israel-Palestine conflict, with many accusing it of maintaining a “business as usual” approach that enables ongoing violence and human rights violations in Gaza.
title: “EU sponsors Israel’s violence through trade and arms deals”: Belgian MEP

description: TEHRAN – In a high-level meeting on Tuesday, Iranian Minister of Defense Brigadier General Aziz Nasirzadeh met with his Armenian counterpart Suren Papikyan in Yerevan, reiterating Iran’s unwavering commitment to safeguarding the stability of its northern borders and strengthening cooperation with its neighbor, Armenia.
title: Borders should remain unchanged, says Iran's defense minister in Armenia

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s foreign ministry has appointed Kazem Gharibabadi as its new Special Representative for Caspian Sea Affairs. The diplomat also serves as Deputy Foreign Minister for Legal and International Affairs, making his appointment all the more meaningful and significant.
title: Navigating Caspian diplomacy: Iran’s new envoy and regional strategy

description: TEHRAN – The dispute over Iran’s nuclear program may seem complex, but it is in fact quite simple. Washington insists Iran should not develop nuclear weapons. Tehran says it is not planning to, and agrees to take steps to prove it in exchange for the termination of sanctions. The U.S. then begins asking for more. Negotiations collapse, and the pattern is repeated.
title: With no sway at negotiating table, US turns to media tactics
European Leaders Normalize War Crimes, Defend Western Imperialism in West Asia
There Is No Place for Genocide in Our Modern World
Europe’s Privileged Partnership with Israel Must End Now

description: TEHRAN – The Schedule of games for the FIBA Asia Cup 2025 to be played in Jeddah from Aug 5-17 has been announced.
title: Stage set for FIBA’s flagship competition in Asia

description: Recently, in the face of a complicated situation marked by increasing external shocks and multiple domestic difficulties and challenges, China’s economy maintained stable growth despite pressure, sustaining the new and positive development momentum. Especially the industrial production grew fast with industrial development transformed towards high-end, intelligent and green, which provides strong support for economic development.
title: China's high-quality industrial development injects new momentum into the world economy

description: TEHRAN-- Iran has designated May 21 (Ordibehesht 31) as “National Day of Ecotourism”.
title: Iran marks May 21 as "National Day of Ecotourism"

description: TEHRAN—Islamic Republic of Iran, which boasts tens of registered cultural elements, seeks to bring the rich and diverse voice of its nation to the world, Human Rights Headquarters declared.
title: Iran, symbol of cultural diversity, peaceful coexistence

description: TEHRAN--Sereshk historical district is one of ancient parts of garden city of Natanz, Isfahan province, said an expert of Natanz Cultural Heritage, Tourism and Handicrafts Department.
title: Sereshk: ancient part of garden city of Natanz

description: TEHRAN—Iran’s Minister of Cultural Heritage, Tourism, and Handicrafts, Seyyed Reza Salehi-Amiri, in a meeting with Japan’s Ambassador to Iran, Tsukada Tamaki, emphasized on history of cultural cooperation and mutual capacities in tourism, education, sports and handicrafts sectors and opened new horizons in Iran-Japan ties.
title: Salehi-Amiri: Iran, Japan can be new model for cultural cooperation in Asia

description: TEHRAN - With 200 days left until the start of the 2025 Asian Youth Para Games, Iran’s National Paralympic Committee (NPC) Technical Deputy, Saeid Solgi, says that the Games is an opportunity to find young talented athletes.
title: Asian Youth Para Games a chance to know new talents, official says

description: TEHRAN- TEDPIX, the main index of the Tehran Stock Exchange (TSE), fell 58,870 points to 3.108 million on Wednesday, which is the fifth day of the Iranian calendar week.
title: TEDPIX loses 58,870 points on Wednesday

description: TEHRAN – The head of the Iranian Red Crescent Society (IRCS), Pirhossein Kolivand, has announced readiness to share its scientific and educational experiences as well as operational expertise with other red crescent societies with the contribution of the International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC).
title: With ICRC assistance, IRCS is ready to share expertise

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s honey exports grew by 20 percent in the previous Iranian year (ended on March 20), according to the official in charge of the country’s beekeeping development plan. However, industry leaders warn that policy-related export barriers continue to threaten the sector’s survival.
title: Annual honey exports rise 20% despite policy hurdles

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s Agriculture Ministry will soon roll out a smart monitoring system for its national crop pattern scheme as part of efforts to improve water efficiency and agricultural productivity, a senior official said.
title: Agriculture Ministry launches smart farming system in 3rd year of crop pattern reform

description: TEHRAN –Health Minister Mohammad-Reza Zafarqandi and his Italian counterpart, Orazio Schillaci, have discussed avenues for promoting collaborations in the health sector, focusing particularly on the aging population and digital health.
title: Iran, Italy to beef up health ties

description: TEHRAN - A member of Iran’s Parliament Energy Committee said the legislature is committed to easing regulations to attract both domestic and foreign investment in the oil and gas sector.
title: Parliament backs investment facilitation in energy sector

description: TEHRAN –Science Minister Hossein Simaei-Sarraf, in separate meetings with his Indonesian and Tunisian counterparts, has conferred on ways to foster scientific and technological relations.
title: Tehran to boost technological co-op with Tunis, Jakarta

description: TEHRAN – Iran and Turkmenistan signed a commercial roadmap on Tuesday aimed at boosting bilateral trade to $3.0 billion.
title: Iran, Turkmenistan sign roadmap targeting $3b in trade

description: TEHRAN –Out of 152,287 out-of-school children aged 6 to 11 identified across the country, about 29,000 have enrolled at schools, an official with the Ministry of Education has said.
title: Some 29,000 out-of-school students resume education

description: TEHRAN - Since March 2, 2015, the murderous regime of Israel has blocked the entry of food, water, and medicine into Gaza, but the world is just a spectator.
title: The world has failed badly in Gaza
